#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string.h>
#define SIZE 100005
int arr[SIZE];
int ans[11][SIZE];
void preProcess()
{
    for(int I = 2;I<=9;I++)
    {
        int n=SIZE-1,t=0,c=0;
        memset(arr,-1,sizeof(arr));
        arr[n]=1;
        int flag = 1;
        ans[I][0]=1;
        int a = I;
        for(int i=1;i<=4000;i++)
        {
            int b = i;
            c=0;
            int sum=0;
            for(int j=n;j>=0;j--)
            {
                if(arr[j]==-1&&c==0)
                {
                    break;
                }
                if(arr[j]==-1)
                {
                    arr[j] = 0;
                }
                t=arr[j]*a+c;
                arr[j]=t%10;
                sum+=arr[j];
                c=t/10;
            }
            flag=sum;
            ans[I][b]=flag;
        }
    }
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    int p=1;
    int a,b;
    preProcess();
    while(p<=t)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
        if(a==0||a==1||b==1)
        {
            printf("Case %d: %d\n",p,a);
            p++;
            continue;
        }
        if(b==0)
        {
            printf("Case %d: %d\n",p,1);
            p++;
            continue;
        }
        printf("Case %d: %d\n",p,ans[a][b]);
        p++;
    }
    return 0;
}
